greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of (1+Gamma[n])/n.
link: H. S. Wilf, Problem 10578, Amer. Math. Monthly, 104 (1997), 270.
formula: Define b(n) = ( (n-1)*(n^2-3*n+1)*b(n-1) - (n-2)^3*b(n-2) )/(n*(n-3)); b(2) = b(3) = 1; sequence gives numerators of b(n) since b(n)=(1+Gamma[n])/n. - Joseph Biberstine (jrbibers(AT)indiana.edu), Sep 12 2006
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
ext: Better description from Joseph Biberstine (jrbibers(AT)indiana.edu), Sep 12 2006
